blocks.name: funpsstri
blocks.content: A condition for subset trichotomy for functions. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Apr-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm funpsstri(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfun(c0), wa(wss(c1, c0), wss(c2, c0)), wo(wss(cdm(c1), cdm(c2)), wss(cdm(c2), cdm(c1)))), w3o(wpss(c1, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wpss(c2, c1)))
} = {
  sylib(w3a(wfun(c0), wa(wss(c1, c0), wss(c2, c0)), wo(wss(cdm(c1), cdm(c2)), wss(cdm(c2), cdm(c1)))), w3o(wpss(c1, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wpss(c2, c1)), wo(wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1)))
  3imp(wfun(c0), wa(wss(c1, c0), wss(c2, c0)), wo(wss(cdm(c1), cdm(c2)), wss(cdm(c2), cdm(c1))), wo(wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1)))
  syl6(wfun(c0), wa(wss(c1, c0), wss(c2, c0)), wi(wo(wss(cdm(c1), cdm(c2)), wss(cdm(c2), cdm(c1))), wo(wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1))), wa(wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1), wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c2)), c2)))
  anim12d(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0), wss(c2, c0), wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1), wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c2)), c2))
  ex(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0), wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1))
  funssres(c0, c1)
  ex(wfun(c0), wss(c2, c0), wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c2)), c2))
  funssres(c0, c2)
  syl5ib(wa(wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1), wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c2)), c2)), wo(wss(cdm(c1), cdm(c2)), wss(cdm(c2), cdm(c1))), wo(wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1)), wo(wss(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), cres(c0, cdm(c2))), wss(cres(c0, cdm(c2)), cres(c0, cdm(c1)))))
  orim12i(wss(cdm(c1), cdm(c2)), wss(cdm(c2), cdm(c1)), wss(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), cres(c0, cdm(c2))), wss(cres(c0, cdm(c2)), cres(c0, cdm(c1))))
  ssres2(cdm(c1), cdm(c2), c0)
  ssres2(cdm(c2), cdm(c1), c0)
  orbi12d(wa(wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1), wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c2)), c2)), wss(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), cres(c0, cdm(c2))), wss(cres(c0, cdm(c2)), cres(c0, cdm(c1))), wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1))
  sseq12(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1, cres(c0, cdm(c2)), c2)
  ancoms(wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1), wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c2)), c2), wb(wss(cres(c0, cdm(c2)), cres(c0, cdm(c1))), wss(c2, c1)))
  sseq12(cres(c0, cdm(c2)), c2, cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1)
  sspsstri(c1, c2)
}

thm funpsstri(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ ((Fun(c0)âˆ§(c1 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ c2 âŠ† c0)âˆ§(dom(c1)âŠ† dom(c2)âˆ¨ dom(c2)âŠ† dom(c1)))â†’(c1 âŠŠ c2 âˆ¨ c1 = c2 âˆ¨ c2 âŠŠ c1))
} = {
  sylib((Fun(c0)âˆ§(c1 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ c2 âŠ† c0)âˆ§(dom(c1)âŠ† dom(c2)âˆ¨ dom(c2)âŠ† dom(c1))), (c1 âŠŠ c2 âˆ¨ c1 = c2 âˆ¨ c2 âŠŠ c1), (c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ¨ c2 âŠ† c1))
  3imp(Fun(c0), (c1 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ c2 âŠ† c0), (dom(c1)âŠ† dom(c2)âˆ¨ dom(c2)âŠ† dom(c1)), (c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ¨ c2 âŠ† c1))
  syl6(Fun(c0), (c1 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ c2 âŠ† c0), ((dom(c1)âŠ† dom(c2)âˆ¨ dom(c2)âŠ† dom(c1))â†’(c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ¨ c2 âŠ† c1)), ((c0 |` dom(c1))= c1 âˆ§(c0 |` dom(c2))= c2))
  anim12d(Fun(c0), c1 âŠ† c0, c2 âŠ† c0, (c0 |` dom(c1))= c1, (c0 |` dom(c2))= c2)
  ex(Fun(c0), c1 âŠ† c0, (c0 |` dom(c1))= c1)
  funssres(c0, c1)
  ex(Fun(c0), c2 âŠ† c0, (c0 |` dom(c2))= c2)
  funssres(c0, c2)
  syl5ib(((c0 |` dom(c1))= c1 âˆ§(c0 |` dom(c2))= c2), (dom(c1)âŠ† dom(c2)âˆ¨ dom(c2)âŠ† dom(c1)), (c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ¨ c2 âŠ† c1), ((c0 |` dom(c1))âŠ†(c0 |` dom(c2))âˆ¨(c0 |` dom(c2))âŠ†(c0 |` dom(c1))))
  orim12i(dom(c1)âŠ† dom(c2), dom(c2)âŠ† dom(c1), (c0 |` dom(c1))âŠ†(c0 |` dom(c2)), (c0 |` dom(c2))âŠ†(c0 |` dom(c1)))
  ssres2(dom(c1), dom(c2), c0)
  ssres2(dom(c2), dom(c1), c0)
  orbi12d(((c0 |` dom(c1))= c1 âˆ§(c0 |` dom(c2))= c2), (c0 |` dom(c1))âŠ†(c0 |` dom(c2)), (c0 |` dom(c2))âŠ†(c0 |` dom(c1)), c1 âŠ† c2, c2 âŠ† c1)
  sseq12((c0 |` dom(c1)), c1, (c0 |` dom(c2)), c2)
  ancoms((c0 |` dom(c1))= c1, (c0 |` dom(c2))= c2, ((c0 |` dom(c2))âŠ†(c0 |` dom(c1))â†” c2 âŠ† c1))
  sseq12((c0 |` dom(c2)), c2, (c0 |` dom(c1)), c1)
  sspsstri(c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: fundmpss
blocks.content: If a class ` F ` is a proper subset of a function ` G ` , then ` dom F C. dom G ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 20-Apr-2011.)

  a1i(wfun(c0), wi(wpss(c1, c0), wss(cdm(c1), cdm(c0))))
  syl(wpss(c1, c0), wss(cdm(c1), cdm(c0)), wss(c1, c0))
  dmss(c1, c0)
  ex(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0), wn(wss(cdm(c0), cdm(c1))))
  sylibr(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wn(wss(cdm(c0), cdm(c1))), wex(hs0, wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))))
  mpd(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wex(hs0, wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))), wex(hs3, wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1))))
  adantl(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0), wex(hs3, wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1))))
  sylib(wpss(c1, c0), wex(hs3, wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1))), wne(cdif(c0, c1), emptycls))
  pssdif(c1, c0)
  n0(hs3, cdif(c0, c1))
  exlimdv(hs3, wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))))
  syld(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1)), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1))))))
  syl(wfun(c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1)), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1))))), wrel(cdif(c0, c1)))
  syl(wfun(c0), wrel(cdif(c0, c1)), wrel(c0))
  funrel(c0)
  reldif(c0, c1)
  ex(wrel(cdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1)), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)))))
  mpd(wa(wrel(cdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1))), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)))), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  elrel(hs0, hs1, cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs3))
  2eximdv(hs0, hs1, wa(wrel(cdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1))), wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)))
  adantl(wrel(cdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1)), wi(wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1))))
  biimpcd(wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs3), cdif(c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdif(c0, c1)))
  eleq1(cv(hs3), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdif(c0, c1))
  df-br(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1))
  eximdv(hs0, wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))))))
  jcad(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))
  a1i(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wi(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))))
  eximi(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  ssbri(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1), c0)
  difss(c0, c1)
  exlimdv(hs1, wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))
  ex(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))
  mtod(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  adantl(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  simprbi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  exlimdv(hs2, wa(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  mpdd(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)))
  ad2antlr(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))))
  ssbrd(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2), c0, wpss(c1, c0))
  pssss(c1, c0)
  com23(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  adantlr(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  imp(wfun(c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  syl5(wfun(c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  simplbi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  brdif(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cv(hs1))
  expd(wfun(c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  syl6(wfun(c0), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  syl(wfun(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  simprbi(wfun(c0), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), wrel(c0))
  dffun2(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  sps(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  2sp(hs1, hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  biimprd(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  breq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cv(hs0), c1)
  bitri(wn(wss(cdm(c0), cdm(c1))), wex(hs0, wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1))))))
  nss(hs0, cdm(c0), cdm(c1))
  exbii(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)))), wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))))))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1))), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))
  eldm(hs1, cv(hs0), c0)
  notbii(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))))
  eldm(hs2, cv(hs0), c1)
  vex(hs0)
  dfpss3(cdm(c1), cdm(c0))
  diff.hs3.c(cdif(c0, c1))
  diff.hs3.w(wa(wfun(c0), wpss(c1, c0)))
  diff.hs3.w(wex(hs0, wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs3))
